comment: The value of the norm of a vector in Hilbert space. Definition of norm in [Beran] p. 96. In the literature, the norm of ` A ` is usually written as "|| ` A ` ||", but we use function value notation to take advantage of our existing theorems about functions. (Contributed by NM, 29-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
